citingPaper.title: Nebulosa recovers single cell gene expression signals by kernel density estimation
citingPaper.abstract: Summary Data sparsity in single-cell experiments prevents an accurate assessment of gene expression when visualised in a low-dimensional space. Here, we introduce Nebulosa, an R package that uses weighted kernel density estimation to recover signals lost through drop-out or low expression. Availability and implementation Nebulosa can be easily installed from www.github.com/powellgenomicslab/Nebulosa
